Description: Available 9/15 or sooner! The classic Pondside two bed on a prime JP street is sure to please. Features living room, dining room, full size bathroom with tub and shower, BIG eat-in kitchen, two private decks, original hardwood floors, coin operated laundry in basement and oil heat. Close to GREAT local amenities - Jamaica Pond, MSPCA and more is all in close proximity, and commuting is a CINCH with the #39 bus to Longwood mere moments from your door and Green Line @ Heath Street in close proximity too. Why wait? Text NOW to schedule an in person appointment after seeing the virtual tour. First Month, Last Month, Full Broker Fee, Lease until 5/31 or 6/30 next year required. No pets, sorry. Landlord requires Good Credit History and Good Rental History.
